title: CryptXXX
extract: CryptXXX Ransomware. CryptXXX ransomware is a new hybrid that comes to us from the same cyber mafia behind Reveton malware, it demands a ransom of 1 Bitcoin (~$500). ... The new version includes network share encryption, meaning even if files have been decrypted, the ransomware can still encrypt files on network shares.
extract_html: CryptXXX Ransomware. CryptXXX ransomware is a new hybrid that comes to us from the same cyber mafia behind Reveton malware, it demands a ransom of 1 Bitcoin (~$500). ... The new version includes network share encryption, meaning even if files have been decrypted, the ransomware can still encrypt files on network shares.
